sentences.en: A pigeon strutted along the roof, cooing rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 一只鸽子沿着屋顶大摇大摆地走, 有节奏地咕咕叫.

sentences.en: After he noticed Thornton on him, Bryant began rhythmically dribbling through his legs , sizing him up.
sentences.cn: 当发现是桑顿来防守他时, 科比开始有节奏的不断胯下运球, 评估着眼前这个菜鸟.

sentences.en: As the frequency of the rubbing reaches that at which the bowl naturally vibrates, the bowl's edge begins rhythmically to change shape, from one slightly oval shape into another.
sentences.cn: 当摩擦的频率达到了碗自身的振动频率时，碗的边缘便会有节奏地改变形状，从一个略微的椭圆形变成另一个略微的椭圆形。

sentences.en: At the same, two arms curving slightly, swinging forward and backward rhythmically like walking.
sentences.cn: 同时, 双臂略弯曲,像走路一样有节奏地前后摆动.

sentences.en: Despite the popularity of rhythmically timed delays, they don't benefit every song.
sentences.cn: 不管是多么普及的节奏同步延迟(就是广泛使用), 他们都不可能适应如何歌曲.

sentences.en: Exposures of rhythmically banded protore are common in the workings.
sentences.cn: 在工作面中常见有韵律条带“原矿石”.

sentences.en: I sometimes listen to the music in the guestroom, swaying my hips and moving rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 我偶尔在客厅听听音乐,摇动我的臀部,然后跟着节奏摆动身体.

sentences.en: Metal rollers clank rhythmically inside the Imperial Distributors warehouse, as employees slide boxes packed with health and beauty products down the lines.
sentences.cn: 帝国经销公司的仓库里，随着员工把装满保健美容产品的箱子从货运线上拖下来，金属滚轴有节奏地叮当作响。

sentences.en: My mother stands, a young beauty painted with batter, rhythmically stirring the cake mix.
sentences.cn: 我美丽的母亲,亭亭玉立地站在那, 有节奏地搅拌着蛋糕粉,脸上沾了点点面糊.

sentences.en: Researchers found that highly familiar song lyrics and formulaic phrases expressed rhythmically had a strong impact on articulation – regardless of whether they were sung or spoken.
sentences.cn: 研究人员发现，有节奏的表达非常熟悉的歌词以及公式化的短语，无论是唱或是说，都对清晰发音有很大的影响。

sentences.en: She stood, swaying her hips, moving rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里，摇摆着臀部，有节奏地晃动着。

sentences.en: Sitting on chair, shoulder circle slowly rhythmically, two shoulders moving forward - and - backward together. Doing 15 times respectively.
sentences.cn: 坐在椅子上, 肩膀慢慢地、有节奏地做画圈动作, 两肩一起向前,一起向后. 各做十五次.

sentences.en: The flower stalk began to move rhythmically -- to breathe.
sentences.cn: 花梗开始有节奏地移动 —— 那是在呼吸.

sentences.en: The heart is a muscular organ that contracts rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 心脏是个肌肉性器官,具有节律性收缩能力.

sentences.en: The market hypnotizes traders a magician a snake, by moving his flute rhythmically up and down.
sentences.cn: 市场对人的催眠作用就像魔术师催眠蛇一样, 有节奏地吹笛子.

sentences.en: To move ( something ) back and forth steadily or rhythmically.
sentences.cn: 摇动前后稳定而有节奏地移动 ( 某物 )

words.tran_cn: [生物] 有节奏的（等于rhythmical）；间歇的；合拍的
